title: Did not receive skin or icon
body: I did not receive the rune icon or the free skin, i had 8 runes pages before yet did not receive anything. Does anyone know why i never got banned or anything.

replies.body: You have to have bought rune pages with RP to receive those rewards. Any pages bought with IP only counted toward the Rune Enthusiast Ward skin.
Ye but i bought 6 pages with rp :(
Have you played a matchmade game yet? You get the rewards via a mission.
Played several never got a mission though, all my mates did though.

I'd recommend submitting a support ticket then, you should have got the mission.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
